---
title: Bunnell-Litler Test
---




# Technique

- Test PIP flexion ROM in MCP neutral (0&deg; extension)
- Test PIP flexion ROM in MCP flexion (90&deg;)

# Interpretation

- IF the PIP is limited in both MCP ranges, it is a capsular issue
- If the PIP is limited in in MCP neutral but has *more* range in MCP flexion, it is a lumbrical issue
